title: Establishing Connection
items: Log in to your Binance account, hover over the account icon in the top-right corner, and select API Management from the dropdown menu.
Enter a name or label for your API key, then click Create API.
Click on Edit Restrictions and disable all permissions except Enable Reading (only Enable Reading should be selected).
Save your permissions, then copy your API Key and Secret Key here.

title: Spot File Upload
items: Log in to your Binance account.
Click on the profile image in the top-right menu.
Click on Export Recent Trade History.

title: Futures File Upload
items: Log in to your Binance account.
Click on the profile image in the top-right menu.
